ygData.subject: The Heritrix effect
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, I just wanted to let everyone know about something that has happened at my work that I ve dubbed the Heritrix effect. We ve used Heritrix on several

From: Micah Wedemeyer <mwedeme@...>
Subject: The Heritrix effect
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=334689939

Hey all,

I just wanted to let everyone know about something that has happened at
my work that I've dubbed "the Heritrix effect."

We've used Heritrix on several projects, and we really love it.
However, in each case, it's only a matter of weeks or months before the
developer involved moves on to a new, more exciting job.  I am the
fourth person that this has happened to.  I had been working with
Heritrix 2.0 for about two months when I got an e-mail out of the blue
offering me my dream job at a hot internet startup.

Surely it's only a coincidence, but then again... ;)

Micah

P.S. Thanks to the archive.org developers for all their hard work on
Heritrix.  It really is an amazing tool.
